description: Woodcut on title page.| A selection of amusing and instructive pamphlets; comprising lives of great warriors & statesmen, battles on sea & land, histories of different countries, accounts of wonderful events, singular characters and notorious offenders, useful family receipts, cookery, &c. &c.| There is a single hand-written sheet, possibly contemporary with publication, attached to the end of this publication, (L.C.2817.A(7)).
